abstract: The All Tomorrow's Parties, the festival that pays lovingly microscopic attention to olden tastes in underground pop from around the world,  has relocated its New York-area edition from the Catskills.
snippet: The All Tomorrow's Parties, the festival that pays lovingly microscopic attention to olden tastes in underground pop from around the world,  has relocated its New York-area edition from the Catskills.

headline.main: Festival Starts a 3-Day Run in Asbury Park
